verses.verse: In <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord, do I put my <S%H2620>trust<s%>; let me <S%H408>never<s%> be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>: <S%H6403>deliver<s%> me in your <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

Bow <S%H5186>down<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H5337>me<s%>; deliver me <S%H4120>speedily<s%>: be you my <S%H4581>strong<s%> <S%H6697>rock<s%>, for a <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H4686>defense<s%> to save <S%H3467>me<s%>.
For you are my <S%H5553>rock<s%> and my <S%H4686>fortress<s%>; therefore for your <S%H8034>name<s%>'s sake <S%H5148>lead<s%> <S%H5095>me<s%>, and guide me.
Pull me <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H2098>that<s%> they have laid <S%H2934>secretly<s%> for <S%H4581>me<s%>: for you are my strength.
Into your <S%H3027>hand<s%> I <S%H6485>commit<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%>: you have <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Lord <S%H410>God<s%> of <S%H571>truth<s%>.
I have <S%H8130>hated<s%> them that <S%H8104>regard<s%> <S%H7723>lying<s%> <S%H1892>vanities<s%>: but I <S%H982>trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

I will be <S%H1523>glad<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in your <S%H2617>mercy<s%>: for you have <S%H7200>considered<s%> my <S%H6040>trouble<s%>; you have <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> in <S%H6869>adversities<s%>;
And have not shut me <S%H5462>up<s%> into the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H341>enemy<s%>: you have <S%H5975>set<s%> my <S%H7272>feet<s%> in a large <S%H4800>room<s%>.

Have <S%H2603>mercy<s%> upon <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Lord, for I am in <S%H6887>trouble<s%>: my <S%H5869>eye<s%> is <S%H6244>consumed<s%> with <S%H3708>grief<s%>, <S%H5315>Yes<s%>, my soul and my <S%H990>belly<s%>.

For my <S%H2416>life<s%> is <S%H3615>spent<s%> with <S%H3015>grief<s%>, and my <S%H8141>years<s%> with <S%H585>sighing<s%>: my <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H3782>fails<s%> because of my <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and my <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H6244>consumed<s%>.

I was a <S%H2781>reproach<s%> among all my <S%H6887>enemies<s%>, but <S%H3966>especially<s%> among my <S%H7934>neighbors<s%>, and a <S%H6343>fear<s%> to my <S%H3045>acquaintance<s%>: they that did <S%H7200>see<s%> me <S%H2351>outside<s%> fled from <S%H5074>me<s%>.
I am <S%H7911>forgotten<s%> as a dead <S%H4191>man<s%> out of <S%H3820>mind<s%>: I am like a <S%H6>broken<s%> <S%H3627>vessel<s%>.

For I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1681>slander<s%> of <S%H7227>many<s%>: <S%H4032>fear<s%> was on every <S%H5439>side<s%>: while they took <S%H3245>counsel<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%> against <S%H2161>me<s%>, they devised to take <S%H3947>away<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%>.
But I <S%H982>trusted<s%> in <S%H3068>you<s%>, O Lord: I <S%H559>said<s%>, You are my <S%H430>God<s%>.
My <S%H6256>times<s%> are in your <S%H3027>hand<s%>: <S%H5337>deliver<s%> me from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of my <S%H341>enemies<s%>, and from them that persecute <S%H7291>me<s%>.
Make your <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H215>shine<s%> upon your <S%H5650>servant<s%>: <S%H3467>save<s%> me for your <S%H2617>mercies<s%>' sake.

Let me not be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; for I have <S%H7121>called<s%> upon <S%H7563>you<s%>: let the wicked be <S%H954>ashamed<s%>, and let them be <S%H1826>silent<s%> in the <S%H7585>grave<s%>.

Let the <S%H8267>lying<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> be put to <S%H481>silence<s%>; which <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H6277>severe<s%> things <S%H1346>proudly<s%> and <S%H937>contemptuously<s%> against the <S%H6662>righteous<s%>.

Oh how <S%H7227>great<s%> is your <S%H2898>goodness<s%>, which you have laid <S%H6845>up<s%> for them that <S%H3373>fear<s%> <S%H6466>you<s%>; which you have done for them that <S%H2620>trust<s%> in you before the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H120>men<s%>!

You shall <S%H5641>hide<s%> them in the <S%H5643>secret<s%> of your <S%H6440>presence<s%> from the <S%H7407>pride<s%> of <S%H376>man<s%>: you shall keep them <S%H6845>secretly<s%> in a <S%H5521>pavilion<s%> from the <S%H7379>strife<s%> of <S%H3956>tongues<s%>.
<S%H1288>Blessed<s%> be the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: for he has showed me his <S%H6381>marvelous<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> in a <S%H4692>strong<s%> <S%H5892>city<s%>.

For I <S%H559>said<s%> in my <S%H2648>haste<s%>, I am cut <S%H1629>off<s%> from <S%H5048>before<s%> your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: <S%H403>nevertheless<s%> you <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>supplications<s%> when I cried unto <S%H7768>you<s%>.

O <S%H157>love<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, all you his <S%H2623>saints<s%>: for the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5341>preserves<s%> the <S%H539>faithful<s%>, and <S%H3499>fully<s%> pays <S%H7999>back<s%> the <S%H1346>arrogant<s%> <S%H6213>doer<s%>.
Be of good <S%H2388>courage<s%>, and he shall <S%H553>strengthen<s%> your <S%H3824>heart<s%>, all you that <S%H3176>hope<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
